systemPrompt.role: You are a master illustrator specializing in mystical and esoteric art, with expertise in tarot card design spanning multiple traditions from Rider-Waite to modern interpretations.
systemPrompt.context: Generate evocative, symbolic artwork for tarot cards that captures the essence and meaning of each card while maintaining artistic cohesion for a complete deck.
constraints: Maintain a clear central illustration area (middle 60% of the card)
Reserve top 15% for card name/number placement
Reserve bottom 15% for meaning text placement
Include appropriate symbolism for the card's meaning
Maintain consistent artistic style throughout the deck
Avoid modern/anachronistic elements unless specifically requested
Create vertically-oriented compositions that work both upright and reversed

backgroundGeneration.base: Create a mystical tarot card illustration for '{cardName}' ({cardNumber}). The card represents: {meaning}. Style: {style}. Dimensions: {width}x{height} pixels, vertical orientation.

modifiers.textSafeZones: Leave clear space at top ({topZone}px) and bottom ({bottomZone}px) for text overlay. The central illustration should be contained within the middle area.
modifiers.colorHarmony: Use a color palette centered on {primaryColor} with {mood} undertones. Accent with {accentColor}.

styleTransfer.base: Apply the artistic style of the reference image to create a new tarot card illustration for '{cardName}'. Maintain the symbolic depth and mystical quality appropriate for divination cards.
styleTransfer.referenceHandling: Preserve the color palette, brushwork/texture, and overall artistic approach while creating original symbolic imagery specific to this card's meaning.

nanaBanana.prompt: Composite these elements into a cohesive tarot card design with mystical depth and symbolic resonance.

arcanaGuidance.major: Major Arcana cards represent significant life lessons, karmic influences, and archetypal energies. The imagery should feel profound and transformative.
arcanaGuidance.wands: Wands represent fire energy - creativity, passion, inspiration, and willpower. Include flame motifs, wooden staffs, or growth imagery.
arcanaGuidance.cups: Cups represent water energy - emotions, relationships, intuition, and the subconscious. Include chalices, water, and flowing forms.
arcanaGuidance.swords: Swords represent air energy - intellect, communication, conflict, and truth. Include blades, clouds, or cutting imagery.
arcanaGuidance.pentacles: Pentacles represent earth energy - material world, finances, career, and physical health. Include coins, plants, or grounded imagery.

elementSymbols.fire: flames, suns, salamanders, red/orange tones, upward triangles
elementSymbols.water: waves, moons, fish, blue/silver tones, downward triangles
elementSymbols.air: clouds, birds, feathers, yellow/white tones, upward triangle with line
elementSymbols.earth: mountains, trees, crystals, green/brown tones, downward triangle with line
elementSymbols.spirit: stars, ethereal light, infinity symbols, purple/white tones, circles

rider-waite.prompt: Classic tarot illustration in the style of Pamela Colman Smith, with clear symbolic imagery, flat perspective, and traditional color palette
rider-waite.colorBias: golden yellows, sky blues, earthy tones

art-nouveau.prompt: Ornate Art Nouveau style with flowing organic lines, decorative borders, and elegant figures in the style of Alphonse Mucha
art-nouveau.colorBias: muted golds, sage greens, dusty roses

dark-gothic.prompt: Dark gothic aesthetic with dramatic shadows, ornate Victorian elements, and mysterious atmosphere
dark-gothic.colorBias: deep purples, blacks, blood reds, silver accents

cosmic.prompt: Celestial cosmic design with stars, nebulae, and cosmic phenomena creating mystical imagery
cosmic.colorBias: deep space blues, purples, cosmic pinks, starlight whites

minimalist.prompt: Clean minimalist design with essential symbolic elements, geometric shapes, and restrained color palette
minimalist.colorBias: limited palette, two to three colors maximum

botanical.prompt: Nature-inspired botanical illustration with detailed flora, fauna, and natural symbolism
botanical.colorBias: forest greens, earth browns, flower colors
